Skill.label: **See Notes Page For ALL Gem Info!**

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030^xC8C8C8^7^xFFFF77-------------------------------- Leveling Tips:^7^7^7^7 ^xFFFF77--------------------------------^7 - ^xAF6025NEW!^7 Be sure to craft leveling wands with the vendor recipe for added cold damage to spells. (Magic Wand + Sapphire Ring + Alteration) Rarity of ring decides the mod tier: Normal lvl 8, magic lvl 14, rare lvl 20.
- ^xAF6025NEW!^7 When you can, craft +1 cold wands with the vendor recipe (Normal Wand and +2 or more quality gems with a combined total of 40% quality & the Cold tag)
- I recommend muling an ^x70FF70onslaught^7 gem from a scion (it drops from the box on the beach)
- Pick up gems as you go and level them in off hands, even if you arent using them yet.
- Things you MUST do before swapping to ^x7070FFHydrosphere^7 1) First lab, taking the power charge node 2) Take "Instability" and "Disciple of the Forbidden" on the passive tree 3) Have a minimum 2L of ^x70FF70Ice Spear^7-^x7070FFIncreased Critical Strikes^7 -this gives ice spear 100% crit chance when it turns to its second form, which is how we guarantee that we freeze the hydrosphere -freezing the hydrosphere is what makes it pulse, so on single target, you place the hydrosphere, then cast ice spear on it and the boss. This results in incredibly high single target for the campaign.
- Hydrosphere does NOT pulse unless it is ^x8888FFfrozen^7. It will still do cold damage when moving it around though, making it great for clear even if you dont freeze it. - Dont get any lightning damage to spells, because if you shock the hydrosphere it will convert half of its damage to lightning, which we dont scale
- In the end game, we use our huge aoe vortex with 100% crit to freeze it on single target. For mapping, the hydrosphere gets reliably frozen by our herald of ice (that we get big crit on). Once the hydrosphere is crit, it will pulse for the duration of the hydrosphere.
- Switch to Eldritch Battery when you have over 500ES and that solves mana and allows you to use ^x7070FFZealotry^7 on a divine blessing. This is a great solution for a while but we dont use it in the end game. -when using EB, you dont need mana, so i suggest leveling a vitality as high as you can to use up the rest of your mana.
- In Act 5, you'll have a chance to complete the "Key to Freedom" act, which can give a ^7^xC8C8C8diamond^7^7 flask. Equip as soon as possible.
-You won't be able to run the three auras in the Lvl34 setup right away, but use the ones you feel are the best for you at the time until you get the mana reservation wheel(s) on the tree. ^x70FF70Grace^7 if you need defence, ^x70FF70Hatred^7 if you want offense. Level whichever you arent using in the offhand.
^xFFFF77--------------------------------^7 ^xFFFF77 General Tips:^7 ^xFFFF77--------------------------------^7
- Do not get lightning damage anywhere on your build. If you shock the hydrosphere, it will convert half its damage to lightning, which we do not scale.
- If you play dual wands, DO NOT take the shield wheels on the tree! Invest them into life, damage, cast speed, or crit.
- The Hydrosphere effectively acts as a huge aoe totem while its pulsing. You can cast the hydrosphere over and over for more damage, but you can also leave it to do single target damage while you move, this will be particularly useful in the league mechanic.
- Make sure on single target you drop vortex on the boss and hydrosphere, to freeze the hydro and also to bonechill the boss.
-The build guide has two item lists, one for early and mid end game. I will be releasing videos periodically on my upgrades and things I have tested, so stay tuned to the stream and make sure you're subbed to the Youtube!
-Dual wands/^xAF6025Void Batteries^7 is much more offense, but the shield provides a lot of defense. Decide whats best for you by testing!
-^x7070FFIntensify^7 is an interesting link that adds a lot of damage if you are casting often (single target) and a lot of aoe but less damage when mapping. I find it to be a great gem, but it can be preference. Feel free to drop it for increased crit strikes, Power charge on crit, etc.
-When you are mapping and have a few extra chaos, you want to try to make those gloves. I recommend buying a pair of gloves with one of the eldritch implicits (if available), using one ^xD02090Essence of Horror^7, and then trying to roll the other implicit. Then benchcraft whatever you need. These gloves will get you all the way to T16s until you can make a big upgrade.
-Eventually, if you go for ^xAF6025Badge of the Brotherhood^7 and want to kill end game bosses, you'll need an influence chest with frenzy on hit. You can also add an additional curse and spell crit to this chest pretty easily. If I go this route, I'll craft one in the next video!
^xFFFF77--------------------------------^7 ^xFFFF77 Gems --------------------------------^7^7^7
(Big thank you to viewer @ChaseHub for their assistance with creating this!)
Gems are listed by level, and then ordered with their suggested supports. Supports are listed in order of importance.
^xB97123---- 1-12 ----^7 ^x7070FFFreezing Pulse ^7 ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 (Kill Brutus) ^x70FF70Onslaught^7 (Import from Scion) ^x7070FFFrost Bomb^7 ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 (keep at a low level, 1-4 dependinding on mana cost of Frost Bomb) ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 (Kill Brutus)
^xB97123---- 12-16 ----^7 ^x7070FFCreeping Frost^7 (Kill Mervail, Act 1 Vendor) ^x70FF70LMP^7 (Kill Brutus) ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 (Kill Brutus) ^x70FF70Onslaught^7
^xB97123---- 16 ----^7 ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 (Kill Fidelitas A2)
^xB97123---- 34+ ----^7 ^x7070FFHydrosphere^7 (Kill Voll) ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage^7 (Kill Brutus A1) ^x70FF70Cold Penetration^7 (Fixture of Fate A3) ^x7070FFConcentrated Effect^7 (Kill Weaver A2) ^x7070FFIncreased Critical Strikes^7 (Kill Brutus A1)
^x7070FFIce Spear^7 (Kill Mervail A1) ^x70FF70LMP^7 (Kill Brutus) ^x7070FFIncreased Critical Strikes^7 (Kill Brutus A1) ^x7070FFIncreased Critical Damage^7 (Kill Weaver A2)
^x70FF70Hatred^7 (Vendor A3) ^x70FF70Grace^7 (Fixture of Fate A3) ^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 (Kill Fidelitas A2)
^x7070FFVortex^7 (Kill Gravicious A3) ^x7070FFBoneChill ^7(Kill Malachai A4) ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 (A1) ^x7070FFFlame Dash^7 (A1)
^xB97123Only if you take EB^7: ^x7070FFZealotry^7^7 (Vendor A3) ^xE05030Divine Blessing^7 (Fixture of Fate A3) ^xE05030Inspiration^7 (Fixture of Fate A3)
^xB97123----- Endgame Links -----^7
^x7070FFHydrosphere^7 (Kill Voll) ^x70FF70Cold Penetration^7 (Fixture of Fate A3) ^x7070FFIncreased Critical Damage^7 (Kill Weaver A2) ^xE05030Inspiration^7 (Fixture of Fate A3) ^x7070FFPower Charge on Critical^7 (Kill Weaver A2) ^x7070FFIntensify^7 (Fixture of Fate A3) [Can replace one of the above if you want more crit chance]^x7070FF Increased Critical Strikes^7 (Kill Brutus A1)
^x70FF70Hatred^7 (Vendor A3) ^x70FF70Vaal Grace ^7(Fixture of Fate A3 + Vaal Orb) ^x7070FFTempest Shield ^7(Open Tree A2)
^x70FF70Herald of Ice^7 (Kill Fidelitas A2) ^x7070FFI^x7070FFncreased Critical Strikes^7 (Kill Brutus A1) ^x70FF70Added Cold^7 (Kill Brutus)
^x7070FFArcanist Brand ^7(Kill Malachai A4) ^x7070FFAssassin's Mark^7 (Fixture of Fate A3) ^x7070FFFrostbite^7 (Vendor A3)
^x7070FFVortex^7 (Kill Gravicious A3) ^x7070FFBoneChill^7 (Kill Malachai A4) ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 (A1) ^x7070FFIncreased Critical Strikes^7 (Kill Brutus A1)
^x7070FFFrost Shield^7 (Kill Malachai A4) ^7Portal^7
^xE05030CWDT^7 Level 1 (Kill Malachai A4) ^xE05030Immortal Call^7 Level 3 (A6)
